events.name: Let's Vibe with Oni Hasan ft All Stars
events.venueAddress: Plot 1/A, Purbachal Express Highway, Bashundhara R/A, Dhaka 1229
events.description: Get ready to vibe with the sensational Oni Hasan and his all-star lineup! This electrifying concert promises an unforgettable night of music, energy, and pure entertainment.
events.fullDescription: Experience the magic of live music with Oni Hasan, one of Bangladesh's most celebrated artists, as he takes the stage with an incredible lineup of all-star performers. This spectacular concert event promises to be an evening filled with chart-topping hits, mesmerizing performances, and an electric atmosphere that will keep you dancing all night long.

artists.name: Oni Hasan
artists.bio: Acclaimed singer-songwriter known for his powerful vocals and stage presence.

artists.name: All Stars Band
artists.bio: A collective of talented musicians bringing diverse sounds to the stage.

ticketTypes.name: General Admission
ticketTypes.description: Standing area with great view of the stage

ticketTypes.name: VIP
ticketTypes.description: Premium seating with exclusive access

events.name: Dhaka Rock Night 2024
events.description: The ultimate rock experience featuring Bangladesh's top rock bands in one electrifying night of pure rock and roll energy.
events.fullDescription: Get ready to rock the night away at Dhaka Rock Night 2024! This epic musical event brings together the best rock bands from Bangladesh for an unforgettable evening of hard-hitting performances, incredible guitar solos, and thunderous drums that will shake the very foundations of the venue.

artists.name: Warfaze
artists.bio: Legendary Bangladeshi rock band with decades of experience.

ticketTypes.name: General Admission
ticketTypes.description: Standing area with full stage view

ticketTypes.name: Premium
ticketTypes.description: Reserved seating with VIP access

events.name: Dhaka Premier League Cricket Final
events.description: The most anticipated cricket match of the year! Watch the best teams battle for the championship title in this thrilling final match.
events.fullDescription: Experience the excitement of Bangladesh's premier cricket tournament as the top two teams face off in the ultimate showdown. This high-stakes match promises exceptional gameplay, nail-biting moments, and unforgettable cricket action that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

ticketTypes.name: General Stand
ticketTypes.description: Open seating in general stands

ticketTypes.name: Premium Gallery
ticketTypes.description: Covered seating with better view

ticketTypes.name: VIP Box
ticketTypes.description: Exclusive VIP box with refreshments

events.name: Dhaka Marathon 2024
events.description: Join thousands of runners in Dhaka's biggest marathon event. Multiple race categories for all fitness levels with prizes and medals for winners.
events.fullDescription: The Dhaka Marathon 2024 is the city's premier running event that brings together professional athletes, amateur runners, and fitness enthusiasts from across Bangladesh and beyond. Choose from full marathon, half marathon, or fun run categories and experience the thrill of running through Dhaka's iconic landmarks.

ticketTypes.name: Full Marathon Registration
ticketTypes.description: Includes race bib, timing chip, and finisher medal

ticketTypes.name: Half Marathon Registration
ticketTypes.description: Includes race bib, timing chip, and finisher medal

ticketTypes.name: Fun Run Registration
ticketTypes.description: Includes race bib and participation medal

events.name: Hamlet - The Tragedy of Denmark
events.description: Experience Shakespeare's timeless masterpiece in this powerful Bengali adaptation. A haunting tale of revenge, madness, and moral complexity.
events.fullDescription: Witness the tragic tale of Prince Hamlet in this exceptional Bengali adaptation of Shakespeare's greatest work. Our talented cast brings this classical drama to life with powerful performances, stunning stage design, and authentic period costumes that transport you to the royal court of Denmark.

cast.name: Asaduzzaman Noor
cast.bio: Renowned actor and director with over 30 years of theatre experience.

ticketTypes.name: Standard Seating
ticketTypes.description: Regular theatre seating with good view

ticketTypes.name: Premium Seating
ticketTypes.description: Front row and balcony premium seats

events.name: Munier Chowdhury's Kabor
events.description: A timeless Bengali drama exploring themes of sacrifice, love, and social justice. One of the most powerful works of Bangladeshi theatre.
events.fullDescription: Experience the dramatic intensity of Munier Chowdhury's masterpiece 'Kabor' (The Grave), a play that delves deep into the human psyche and social consciousness. This production brings together Bangladesh's finest theatre artists to present a story that resonates with contemporary issues while honoring our rich cultural heritage.

cast.name: Ataur Rahman
cast.bio: Distinguished theatre actor with numerous awards.

cast.name: Rokeya Prachy
cast.bio: Celebrated actress known for dramatic roles.

ticketTypes.name: General Admission
ticketTypes.description: Standard theatre seating

ticketTypes.name: Reserved Seating
ticketTypes.description: Premium reserved seats with better view

events.name: Digital Bangladesh Summit 2024
events.description: The premier technology conference in Bangladesh featuring industry leaders, government officials, and tech innovators discussing the future of digital transformation.
events.fullDescription: Join Bangladesh's most prestigious technology conference where industry pioneers, government leaders, and tech innovators come together to shape the digital future of our nation. This comprehensive event covers AI, blockchain, fintech, e-governance, and digital infrastructure with actionable insights for businesses and policymakers.

agenda.session: Panel Discussion: AI & Machine Learning in Bangladesh

ticketTypes.name: Standard Pass
ticketTypes.description: Access to all sessions, lunch, and networking

ticketTypes.name: Premium Pass
ticketTypes.description: VIP seating, exclusive networking, and gift bag

ticketTypes.name: Student Pass
ticketTypes.description: Special rate for students with valid ID

events.name: Healthcare Innovation Conference 2024
events.description: Explore the latest innovations in healthcare technology, telemedicine, and medical research. Leading healthcare professionals share insights on improving patient care.
events.fullDescription: This comprehensive healthcare conference brings together medical professionals, researchers, and technology innovators to discuss breakthrough developments in healthcare delivery, medical technology, and patient care systems. Learn about the latest trends in telemedicine, AI in diagnostics, and healthcare management.

ticketTypes.name: Medical Professional
ticketTypes.description: For registered doctors and healthcare professionals

ticketTypes.name: Student/Intern
ticketTypes.description: For medical students and interns

ticketTypes.name: General Attendee
ticketTypes.description: For other interested participants

events.name: Dhaka Food Festival 2024
events.description: A culinary extravaganza showcasing the best of Bangladeshi cuisine alongside international flavors. Food stalls, cooking competitions, and cultural performances.
events.fullDescription: Indulge in a gastronomic journey at Dhaka's premier food festival! Experience the rich flavors of traditional Bangladeshi cuisine, explore international food stalls, watch live cooking demonstrations by celebrity chefs, and enjoy cultural performances. This family-friendly event celebrates the diverse culinary heritage of our nation.

highlights.description: Over 100 stalls featuring authentic Bangladeshi dishes
Food from Thai, Chinese, Indian, and Middle Eastern cuisines
Live cooking contests with celebrity chef judges

ticketTypes.name: General Entry
ticketTypes.description: Access to all food stalls and performances

ticketTypes.name: Family Package
ticketTypes.description: Entry for 2 adults and 2 children under 12

ticketTypes.name: VIP Pass
ticketTypes.description: Skip lines, VIP seating, and exclusive chef meet & greet

events.name: Dhaka Book Fair 2025
events.description: Bangladesh's largest book fair featuring thousands of books, author meet & greets, literary discussions, and cultural programs celebrating Bengali literature.
events.fullDescription: Join the celebration of Bengali literature and culture at the historic Dhaka Book Fair! This month-long festival brings together publishers, authors, and book lovers from across the country. Discover new publications, meet your favorite authors, attend literary discussions, and enjoy cultural programs in the heart of Dhaka.

highlights.description: Over 500 stalls with books in Bengali and English
Meet & greet with renowned authors and poets
Poetry recitations, music, and dance performances

ticketTypes.name: Free Entry
ticketTypes.description: Free entry to all book stalls and basic programs

ticketTypes.name: Special Events Pass
ticketTypes.description: Access to exclusive author sessions and VIP programs

events.name: Dhaka Comedy Club - Stand Up Special
events.description: Get ready for a night of non-stop laughter with Bangladesh's funniest stand-up comedians. Perfect way to end the year with humor and joy!
events.fullDescription: Ring in the New Year with the biggest comedy event of 2024! Our lineup of Bangladesh's most talented stand-up comedians will have you laughing until your sides hurt. From observational humor to satirical commentary on daily life, this special show promises an evening of pure entertainment and laughter.

comedians.name: Naveed Mahbub
comedians.bio: Popular comedian known for his witty social commentary

comedians.name: Zitu Ahsan
comedians.bio: Rising star in Bangladesh's comedy scene

comedians.name: Shafiq Tuhin
comedians.bio: Veteran comedian with decades of experience

events.name: Roast Night - Celebrity Edition
events.description: The ultimate roast night where popular celebrities get hilariously roasted by top comedians. Adult humor and celebrity guests guaranteed!
events.fullDescription: Experience the most entertaining celebrity roast night in Dhaka! Watch as popular celebrities from entertainment, sports, and media get lovingly roasted by our panel of expert comedians. This adults-only event features unfiltered humor, celebrity guests, and unexpected moments that will leave you in stitches.

roasters.name: Rafsan Haq
roasters.bio: Master of roast comedy and social media star
